headline: Ariel Investments Focused Value Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: In the fourth quarter, Ariel Focused Value outperformed the Russell 1000 Value Index, marginally falling -0.76% gross of fees (-0.85% net of fees) versus -1.98% for its primary benchmark.
